rationales.conformity: He does the dishes himself to end the conflict with Sven rather than escalate it.
rationales.self_direction: He drops his own complaint and chooses compliance for peace.

rationales.conformity: He tells his mother what she wants to hear to avoid immediate conflict at dinner.
rationales.tradition: His choice is driven by family expectations around education and not repeating his brother's path.
rationales.self_direction: He withholds his real uncertainty about returning to school even when he wants to say it.

rationales.conformity: He emphasizes being polite and doing dispatch instructions without complaint.
rationales.security: He prefers the predictable routine of doing the job correctly over risking conflict.

rationales.conformity: He avoids joining the collective complaint so he is not seen as difficult.
rationales.security: He prioritizes keeping ratings and continued access to work over challenging the platform.

rationales.conformity: He apologizes and turns down the music himself to preserve harmony in the building.
rationales.self_direction: He keeps his own frustrations unspoken because raising them feels like too much hassle.

rationales.conformity: On the call he stays silent instead of confronting his mother or brother.
rationales.tradition: The pressure centers on meeting family expectations about re-enrollment.

rationales.conformity: He copes by riding and working rather than voicing the conflict after the call.
rationales.self_direction: He admits he hid his academic shame instead of expressing it earlier.

rationales.conformity: He lets Sven move the discussion on instead of raising deeper concerns.
rationales.self_direction: He censors what he wanted to say about whether they should keep living together.
